title: An academic who was imprisoned in Iran welcomes Brittney Griner to a ‘bizarre club.’
Man Accused in 2015 Terror Attacks in Mali Is Extradited to the U.S.
description: Fawaz Ould Ahmed Ould Ahemeid was brought to the United States on Friday and appeared on Saturday before a federal magistrate judge in Brooklyn, prosecutors said.

title: Belgian Inquiry Into Qatar and Bribery Stuns European Parliament
description: The police detained five people, including former and current members of the body, in a case centered on possible attempts to influence the Parliament’s economic and political decisions.

title: What Happened to the Qatar Women’s National Team?
description: A squad that featured in the host nation’s bid to host the World Cup in 2010 hasn’t played a game in eight years.

title: Rights Advocates Honored at Nobel Peace Prize Ceremony
description: The laureates from Russia, Ukraine and Belarus have become symbols of resistance during Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.

title: German Police Block Off Parts of Dresden After Standoff With Gunman
description: The police said they believed that the suspect, whom they identified as a 40-year-old German citizen, had shot his mother before moving on to the center of the city.

title: Fool’s Paradise
description: The finale of “The White Lotus” airs tomorrow. Here’s to being a fan, without going overboard.

title: Live Updates: Brittney Griner Begins Her Return Home at Military Hospital
description: The American basketball star was receiving the necessary evaluations and treatment in San Antonio. The Russian government was lauding the release of Viktor Bout, the notorious arms dealer.

title: The World Comes to Montreal to Reverse a Rise in Species Extinction
description: A conversation with Prime Minister Justin Trudeau during the United Nations’ biodiversity negotiations in Montreal.

title: The World Comes to Montreal to Reverse a Rise in Species Extinction
description: A conversation with Prime Minister Justin Trudeau during the United Nations’ biodiversity negotiations in Montreal.

title: Jimmy Lai of Hong Kong Gets Five Year Sentence
description: Jimmy Lai, the outspoken owner of a pro-democracy newspaper, was sentenced to more than five years in prison for violating terms of a lease contract.

title: Brittney Griner Swap Puts Spotlight on Americans in Russia
description: Westerners in Russia have to weigh the risks of living and working in the country against professional and financial opportunities there.

title: Cuba’s Declining Economy Prompts ‘Historic’ Migration to US
description: The pandemic and tougher U.S. sanctions have decimated Cuba’s economy, prompting the biggest migration since Fidel Castro rose to power.

title: His Estate Has 3 Swimming Pools and a Stable. He Says He’s Not Rich.
description: A rare look inside a Qatari home offers a glimpse at how the lucrative gas industry has transformed the formerly poor, barren country.

title: China’s Youths, Stung by Years of Covid Rules, Fear Grim Job Future
description: A sluggish economy continues to leave many young people unemployed, with few job prospects or hopes to tap into the rising incomes their parents enjoyed during boom times.

title: She Came Out of Nowhere, and Now No One in France Can Ignore Her
description: Sandrine Rousseau is using her talent for grabbing headlines with provocative ideas to shift the focus of the national debate from the themes favored by the far-right to climate change and #MeToo.

title: China’s Looming ‘Tsunami’ of Covid Cases Will Test Its Hospitals
description: To conserve resources for the severely ill, the government is urging residents not to seek help unless necessary. But the pivot has left many confused and anxious.

title: Spat Over Patriot Missiles Reveals Deepening Rifts in Europe Over Ukraine
description: Relations between Warsaw and Berlin, never warm, have deteriorated since the start of the Ukraine war, damaging unity in both NATO and the European Union.

title: A Chatty Putin’s Underlying Message: I’m Still in Charge
description: In a string of appearances, it wasn’t so much what the Russian leader said, much of it false, as it was his apparent need to demonstrate that he is healthy, alert and in control.

title: Russia and Iran Are Building  Defense Partnership, White House Warns
description: The National Security Council spokesman, John Kirby, said that the U.S. was “concerned that Russia intends to provide Iran with advanced military components.”
